adrFormatAddress: 309 E 103rd St, New York, NY 10029-5603, USA

originalText.text: I currently go to this school,as a 6th grader’!This school is amazing. Many sports & different opportunities here.For example we do something different here like meditating not all schools have the chance to take 15 minutes out of the day to close your eyes and take a deep breath all day way out to the deepest corners of earth and right back to you.East Harlem school does totally recommend coming!!

originalText.text: I go to the east Harlem school and am a current 8th grader. The east Harlem school is my second home and I love it!

text.text: I go to the east Harlem school and am a current 8th grader. The east Harlem school is my second home and I love it!

originalText.text: Por mi experiencia está escuela te bajan la autoestima y te humillan tanto a los niños como a los padres. Yo fuy hablar con Iván me gritó y me votó de su oficina por que el está acostumbrado a que todo le digan que si, esa es la única manera para tú poder seguir en esa escuela. Yo nunca le falte el respeto pero el si! El problema fue que mi hijo piso a una niña para que deje de jugar en una hora de clases y por ese motivo le dijo que es agresivo cosa que La Niña le dijo a Iván que ella empezó y que mi hijo no le había hecho daño.... yo le dije que me enseñe si había daño físico o psicológico a Iván ya que juzga a mi hijo de agresivo y me dijo que es su escuela y el hace lo que quiera si no que me large!!! Y si quería seguir mi hijo tenía que yo firmar una carta que decía que mi hijo es agresivo cosa que yo nunca la firme porque el no tenía pruebas alguna..

text.text: From my experience, this school lowers your self-esteem and humiliates both the children and the parents. I went to talk to Iván, he yelled at me and voted me out of his office because he is used to everyone telling him that yes, that is the only way for you to continue at that school. I never disrespected him but he did! The problem was that my son stepped on a girl to stop her from playing during a class hour and for that reason he told her that he is aggressive, which The Girl told Iván that she started it and that my son had not hurt her. ... I told him to show me if there was physical or psychological damage to Iván since he judges my son to be aggressive and he told me that it is his school and he does whatever he wants otherwise he can leave me!!! And if my son wanted to continue, I had to sign a letter saying that my son is aggressive, which I never signed because he had no proof.

originalText.text: Una excelente escuela por su programa, dísciplina, compañerismo etc.,gran recinto para el desarrollo educativo.

text.text: An excellent school for its program, discipline, camaraderie, etc., a great facility for educational development.
